435.text: If you wish to open an account with any of these payment options,

438.text: go to 3UpNext Homepage and click on the ICON for the appropriate payment processor.

445.text: Please make sure to follow their guidelines and comply with their Terms & Conditions.

451.text: Please also make sure to verify your Account with them so your money is safe.
